params.description: Initialize experiment with hardware configuration and well selection

metadata.description: Initialize experiment with hardware configuration and well selection

description.label: Description
description.defaultValue: Initialize experiment with hardware configuration and well selection

verify_well_availability.label: Verify Well Availability
verify_well_availability.description: Ensure selected well is not in use

source_well.label: Source Well
source_well.description: Well position in source labware (e.g., A1, B2)

target_well.label: Target Well
target_well.description: Well position in target labware (e.g., A1-D6)

params.description: Setup reference electrode for electrochemical measurement

metadata.description: Electrode installation and positioning for electrochemical experiments

description.label: Description
description.defaultValue: Setup reference electrode for electrochemical measurement

insertion_depth.label: Insertion Depth
insertion_depth.description: How deep to insert the electrode

params.description: Unified electrochemical measurement supporting OCV, CP, CVA, PEIS, and LSV

metadata.description: Various electrochemical measurement techniques (OCV, CP, CVA, PEIS, LSV)

description.label: Description
description.defaultValue: Unified electrochemical measurement supporting OCV, CP, CVA, PEIS, and LSV

cva_cycles.label: Number of Cycles
cva_cycles.description: Number of CV cycles to perform

peis_start_frequency.label: Start Frequency
peis_start_frequency.description: Starting frequency for impedance sweep (10kHz from script)

peis_end_frequency.label: End Frequency
peis_end_frequency.description: Ending frequency for impedance sweep (0.1Hz from script)

peis_points_per_decade.label: Steps per Decade
peis_points_per_decade.description: Number of measurement steps per frequency decade (5 from script)

peis_minimum_cycles.label: Minimum Cycles
peis_minimum_cycles.description: Minimum number of cycles per frequency point

peis_bias_vs_ocp.label: Bias vs OCP
peis_bias_vs_ocp.description: Apply DC bias relative to OCP

lsv_start_voltage.label: Start Voltage
lsv_start_voltage.description: Starting voltage for linear sweep voltammetry

lsv_end_voltage.label: End Voltage
lsv_end_voltage.description: Ending voltage for linear sweep voltammetry

data_collection_enabled.label: Data Collection Enabled
data_collection_enabled.description: Whether to collect data from this measurement step

cycle_dependent_collection.label: Cycle Dependent Collection
cycle_dependent_collection.description: Data collection depends on current cycle number (controlled by Sequence Control)

data_tag.label: Data Tag/Label
data_tag.description: Tag for identifying this data in analysis (e.g., "Deposition", "Dissolution", "Rest")

params.description: Multi-stage electrode and reactor cleaning with ultrasonic treatment

description.label: Description
description.defaultValue: Multi-stage electrode and reactor cleaning with ultrasonic treatment

insertion_depth.label: Insertion Depth
insertion_depth.description: How deep to insert cleaning tool

pump1_volume.label: Pump 1 Volume
pump1_volume.description: Volume of cleaning solution from pump 1

pump2_volume.label: Pump 2 Volume
pump2_volume.description: Volume of cleaning solution from pump 2

cleaning_cycles.label: Cleaning Cycles
cleaning_cycles.description: Number of cleaning cycles to perform

params.description: Export DC/AC electrochemical data, metadata, and logs with enhanced cycle range file naming

metadata.description: Export experimental data to various file formats

description.label: Description
description.defaultValue: Export DC/AC electrochemical data, metadata, and logs with enhanced cycle range file naming

file_naming_template.label: File Naming Template
file_naming_template.description: Select predefined naming pattern or choose custom

cycle_range_format.label: Cycle Range Format
cycle_range_format.description: Format for displaying cycle ranges in filenames

include_timestamp_in_filename.label: Include Timestamp
include_timestamp_in_filename.description: Add timestamp to filename for uniqueness

cycle_start.label: Start Cycle
cycle_start.description: First cycle in the range (from Sequence Control)

cycle_end.label: End Cycle
cycle_end.description: Last cycle in the range (from Sequence Control)

total_cycles.label: Total Cycles
total_cycles.description: Total number of cycles (from Sequence Control)

dc_file_name.label: DC File Name Prefix
dc_file_name.description: Custom prefix for DC data files

ac_file_name.label: AC File Name Prefix
ac_file_name.description: Custom prefix for AC impedance files

metadata_export.label: Metadata Export
metadata_export.description: Export experiment metadata as JSON file

include_parameters.label: Include Parameters
include_parameters.description: Include all UO parameters in metadata

include_timestamps.label: Include Timestamps
include_timestamps.description: Include detailed timestamps for each operation

log_level_filter.label: Log Level Filter
log_level_filter.description: Minimum log level to include in export

params.description: Loop and conditional control for experimental sequences with data collection management

metadata.description: Loop and conditional control for experimental sequences

description.label: Description
description.defaultValue: Loop and conditional control for experimental sequences with data collection management

loop_count.label: Loop Count
loop_count.description: Number of iterations (for fixed count type)

data_collection_start.label: Data Collection Start
data_collection_start.description: From which cycle to start collecting data

data_collection_mode.label: Data Collection Mode
data_collection_mode.description: How to collect data across cycles

stabilization_cycles.label: Stabilization Cycles
stabilization_cycles.description: Number of initial cycles for stabilization (no data collection)

last_n_cycles.label: Last N Cycles
last_n_cycles.description: Number of last cycles to collect (for Last N Cycles mode)

params.description: Monitor and display current cycle status, progress, and statistics

metadata.description: Monitor and display current cycle status, progress, and statistics

description.label: Description
description.defaultValue: Monitor and display current cycle status, progress, and statistics

display_mode.label: Display Mode
display_mode.description: Level of detail in cycle display

show_progress_bar.label: Show Progress Bar
show_progress_bar.description: Display visual progress bar for cycle completion

current_cycle.label: Current Cycle
current_cycle.description: Current cycle number (read from sequence control)

total_cycles.label: Total Cycles
total_cycles.description: Total number of cycles (from sequence control)

elapsed_time_total.label: Total Elapsed Time
elapsed_time_total.description: Total elapsed time for all cycles

data_collection_enabled.label: Data Collection Enabled
data_collection_enabled.description: Whether to collect data from this monitoring step

cycle_dependent_collection.label: Cycle Dependent Collection
cycle_dependent_collection.description: Data collection depends on current cycle number (controlled by Sequence Control)

data_tag.label: Data Tag/Label
data_tag.description: Tag for identifying this data in analysis (e.g., "Cycle_Monitor", "Progress_Tracking")
